>::DrillBit::
>
>He opened a comm to Scorponok.
>"When you reach the English channel you'll have to swim. Watch out for
>enemy bots and other surprises."

Scorponok not approaching the channel stops and reverts to beast mode. Then
he starts to click his claws nervously. Through all his ecxitement, he
almost forgot that there is enemies. He dosent even know them yet. He
quickly scurries towards the channel speaking through his radio. "Uhh,
yeah, um is there any Warriors that have aquatic beast modes" he asks as he
looks into the water hesitantly.
